name: Silhouette Studio Document
summary: Learn about .STUDIO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The STUDIO file was the primary file associated with versions 1 and 2 of Silhouette Studio. When you would create and save a design project, the STUDIO file was the default format used to store the design.

However, with the release of version 3 of Silhouette Studio, the STUDIO file has been replaced by the .STUDIO3 file. The STUDIO file is still supported by version 3 of Silhouette Studio. You can also save your design as a STUDIO file, although this may leave some advanced features unsaved.

description: A STUDIO file is a design project created by Silhouette Studio, a program used to design items that can be cut with a Silhouette electronic cutting machine. It contains a design, which may include shapes, images, text, lines, colors, gradients, patterns, and effects. STUDIO files also store design page settings, cut settings, and registration marks.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .studio file in Silhouette Studio 3
images.caption: STUDIO file open in Silhouette Studio 3
